name: Kiberki
description:
It's the year 21XX, life was very prosperous and peaceful, until....An unknown organization brought the world under siege. This organization headed by a ruthless demonlord, Vaman, has summoned a few of their minions in various regions, and 5 Magical Orbs were hidden throughout the land.

You play as Kiberki as well as his newfound friends who are on a journey to stop the madness from Vaman...or die trying.
